titles.title: Supporting the creation of the Office of the Coordinator for Reconstruction and Stabilization at the Department of State, and for other purposes.
Supporting the creation of the Office of the Coordinator for Reconstruction and Stabilization at the Department of State, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary:
Supports the creation of the Office of the Coordinator for Reconstruction and Stabilization in the Department of State, and congratulates the President, the Cabinet, and the National Security Council (NSC) for addressing the interagency challenges posed by stabilization and post-conflict reconstruction operations.
Recognizes that weak or failing countries pose potential danger to U.S. security.
Urges the Office to be proactive in addressing potential weak or failing countries so that crisis situations might be resolved peaceably.
